entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Markham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle and fog changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
